mapper.insert: insert into zj_user_config (user_config_id, addr, card_number, domain_name, sub_user_num, sub_user_num_all, province, city, county, province_id, city_id, county_id, front_image, reverse_image, apply_time, face_img, entering_status) values (#{userConfigId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{domainName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subUserNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subUserNumAll,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{countyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{frontImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reverseImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{faceImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enteringStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update zj_user_config set addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_number = #{cardNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, domain_name = #{domainName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_user_num = #{subUserNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sub_user_num_all = #{subUserNumAll,jdbcType=INTEGER}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, front_image = #{frontImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reverse_image = #{reverseImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, face_img = #{faceImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entering_status = #{enteringStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_config_id = #{userConfigId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_config_id, addr, card_number, domain_name, sub_user_num, sub_user_num_all, province, city, county, province_id, city_id, county_id, front_image, reverse_image, apply_time, face_img, entering_status from zj_user_config where user_config_id = #{userConfigId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
